name: TrueorFalse
0:
”Alexa, play true or false”
”Alexa, open true or false”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: true or false
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Think you’re a trivia pro? This is a fun game to test your knowledge about the world by answering either "true" or "false". The rules are simple, but the questions aren’t. It’s the perfect ice-breaker for parties and gatherings. Play with up to 20 users.

True or False is part of Voice Arcade. To discover the entire collection just ask Alexa to "open Voice Arcade".


WE WANT TO HEAR FROM YOU!
-------------------------------------
If you have any questions, issues or suggestions please let us know at hi@voicearcade.com and we’ll get straight back to you!
